entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Deep River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:28 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Drizzle, 0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Garrison Petawawa 2:00 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023
Condition: Light Drizzle
Temperature: 0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: -0.6°C
Wind: W 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 2:38 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Overcast. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Overcast. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 2:38 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 2:38 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023
